definition: surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: It is unclear what caused the Sunda clouded leopard to evolve into two forms.
sentences.chinese: 是什么导致了巽他云豹进化上的分野还不得而知。

sentences.english: However, genetic studies revealed that there are actually two quite distinct clouded leopard species.
sentences.chinese: 然而，基因研究揭示了两个不同云豹种类的存在。

sentences.english: The clouded leopard and Japanese giant salamander are new residents, on display in the National Zoo for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 云豹和日本大蝾螈是首次在美国国家动物园展出。

sentences.english: Researchers believe there are less than 10,000 of the cats alive in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员认为野生状态下的巽他云豹数量不足1万只。

sentences.english: Another hung on in Borneo, becoming the Sunda clouded leopard.
sentences.chinese: 其余的只留在婆罗洲，成为巽他云豹。

sentences.english: Researchers believe there are less than 10, 000 of the cats alive in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员认为野生状态下的巽他云豹数量不足1万只。

definition: (bird species of China) golden eagle (Aquila chrysaetos)
civet (arboreal cat)/viverrid (mammal group including mongoose and civet)
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
